name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provide canned responses by ChatGPT when you message with customers in Mercadolivre

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**New Feature: Free Access to ChatGPT Plus, no OpenAi or ChatGPT Account needÔºÅ**
Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPT is a Chrome extension to help Mercadolivre seller message with customers smoothly. It a free tool like Crisp magicRply or Drift GPT. Simply select the customer's question, then Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPT will feedback the reply advice that given by GPT-3.5 Chatbot.

üöÄ Feature
‚óè Provide canned responses or reply template by ChatGPT base on the question of customers.
‚óè Simply select the question content.
‚óè Edit feedback from OpenAI in Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPT to reply nicely to customers
‚óè Copy content by one click. 
‚óè Multiple output languages.

üöÄ Who is Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPT for
Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPTis made forMercadolivreseller, customer service staff or someone need reply customer's question to solve their problem.

üöÄ How to use it
‚û°Ô∏è Make sure you have a ChatGPT account
‚û°Ô∏è Simply select any online content by your mouse
‚û°Ô∏è Right Click your mouse to open menu and select "Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPT" to open the extension window
‚û°Ô∏è Choose what languages you need, and click "Ask for template"
‚û°Ô∏è The canned responses will displayed in the extension window in a minute.

Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPT is a Chrome extension to help Mercadolivre seller message with customers smoothly. It a free tool like Crisp magicRply or Drift GPT. Simply select the customer's question, then Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPT will feedback the reply advice that given by GPT-3.5 Chatbot.

üöÄ Feature
‚óè Provide canned responses or reply template by ChatGPT base on the question of customers.

‚óè Edit feedback from OpenAI in Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPT to reply nicely to customers

üöÄ Who is Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPT for
Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPTis made forMercadolivreseller, customer service staff or someone need reply customer's question to solve their problem.

üöÄ How to use it
‚û°Ô∏è Make sure you have a ChatGPT account
‚û°Ô∏è Simply select any online content by your mouse
‚û°Ô∏è Right Click your mouse to open menu and select "Mercadolivre Customer Service Helper with GPT" to open the extension window
‚û°Ô∏è Choose what languages you need, and click "Ask for template"
‚û°Ô∏è The canned responses will displayed in the extension window in a minute.
